LanguageData.Ballista.label: ballista
LanguageData.Ballista.description: Researching a ballista. RAtkin are made for easy handling.
LanguageData.Advanced_BallistaBolt.label: advanced ballista bolt
LanguageData.Advanced_BallistaBolt.description: Researching a variety of ballista bolts.
LanguageData.MicroOptical.label: micro optical
LanguageData.MicroOptical.description: Imitate human optical equipment. Redesigned for use by Ratkin with poor vision.
LanguageData.FlechetteBullet.label: flechette bullet
LanguageData.FlechetteBullet.description: Apply Ratkin arrowheads to bullets. The Ratkin style placelet bullet is a little heavy but designed to penetrate armor.
LanguageData.RatkinClothing.label: Ratkin clothing
LanguageData.RatkinClothing.description: Ratkin designs clothes that are easy to wear. Produces professional and convenient clothes.
LanguageData.HighClassClothing.label: high class clothing
LanguageData.HighClassClothing.description: Antique, enhanced clothing. Antique clothes for combat and diplomacy.
